properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v3 v8 v9 v10 v11 v12

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the trumpet sound
And let the children of God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
arise in worship
Let the trumpet sound

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And let the high praise of God
the high praise of God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
the high praise of God be in the air
Hear all you people God is good

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And good to those of us who fear Him
He has not treated us as we deserve
but has called us forth

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
He has called us forth
He has called us forth
He has called us forth into His marvelous glorious light
Let the trumpet sound

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
And let the children of God
arise in worship
Let the trumpet sound

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
the high praise of God be in the air
Holy and righteous are His ways
Wisdom and justice go before Him

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
He has exalted far above all gods
We shall praise His name
We shall praise His name

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
We shall praise His name
His great and wonderful excellent name
Let the trumpet sound!

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
And let the children of God arise in worship!
Let the trumpet sound!

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
And let the high praise of God
the high praise of God
the high praise of God
the high praise of God be in the air.
